snippet.title: Whitestone Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now for:
PlayStation
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/221802
Xbox
https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/whitestone/9nx8wp3g9zzd

Coming soon to:
Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/whitestone-switch/
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2324700/Whitestone/

Welcome aboard the colossal airship, 'Sunchaser', at the dawn of the 20th century!
Backed by his good friend, Jack lands his first major career move as an apprentice in the Archaeology department. On its capstone voyage to the Arctic, it's smooth sailing until his quarters are broken into and friend goes missing.
A madness spreads across the ship. The crew looks at Jack with paranoia, and he looks back the same. Unsure who to trust, Jack is forced to fight nightmares, both mental and physical, as he becomes the prime suspect for a terrible deed.
Meet the crew, work hard, and unravel the truth with help from allies... or don't.
Whitestone starts off as an investigation and then goes far beyond. Want a happy JRPG ending? Study, help out your crewmates, and see the voyage completed! Want a survival horror ending? Make the... err not so right choices.
Survival is not guaranteed, not for Jack or his friends. Your choices matter. Go to the banquet with friends? Stay in the spooky infirmary alone at night? Or do neither! Torture? Or a dinner party? Multiple routes lead to not only different endings, but different storylines, protagonists and enemies.
 
For more info visit us @ www.hailstorm-games.com
